entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:45 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow or rain. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 7:45 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow or rain ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 7:45 PM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
